name: It Came from the Desert
description:
It Came from the Desert is an adventure, racing and arcade game developed by Cinemaware. It came out on 01-01-1989. It was published by Cinemaware. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
It Came from the Desert is available on Commodore / Amiga and PC.
It was produced by James Maxwell, Jerry Albright, Jim Simmons and Pat Cook. James Maxwell directed the game. It was scored by Greg Haggard and Jim Simmons.
